hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOTE.EOTE_ID, EOTE.CREATOR, EOTE.CREATE_TIME, EOTE.MODIFIER, EOTE.MODIFY_TIME, EOTE.REC_VER, EOTE.REC_STATUS, EOTE.ORG_ID, EOTE.EOTE_EOTO_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE AS EOTE_MODULE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_NAME AS EOTE_MODULE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE AS EOTE_MODULE_TYPE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_NAME AS EOTE_MODULE_TYPE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_SEQUENCE AS EOTE_TAB_SEQUENCE, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_CODE AS EOTE_TAB_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_NAME AS EOTE_TAB_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_TAB_NAME_EN AS EOTE_TAB_NAME_EN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_ROW AS EOTE_FIELD_ROW, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_COLUMN AS EOTE_FIELD_COLUMN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_CODE AS EOTE_FIELD_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_NAME AS EOTE_FIELD_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_NAME_EN AS EOTE_FIELD_NAME_EN, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_TYPE_CODE AS EOTE_FIELD_TYPE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_TYPE_NAME AS EOTE_FIELD_TYPE_NAME, EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_PARAMETER AS EOTE_FIELD_PARAMETER, EOEF.EOEF_REQUIRE AS EOTE_REQUIRE, EOEF.EOEF_MODIFIED AS EOTE_MODIFIED, NVL(EOTE.EOTE_VALUE_CODE, EOEF.EOEF_DEFAULT_VALUE) AS EOTE_VALUE_CODE, EOTE.EOTE_VALUE_NAME FROM EO_EXTENSION_FIELD EOEF LEFT JOIN EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER_EXTENSION EOTE ON EOTE.ORG_ID = EOEF.ORG_ID AND EOTE.EOTE_MODULE_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE AND EOTE.EOTE_MODULE_TYPE_CODE =EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE AND EOTE.EOTE_TAB_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_TAB_CODE AND EOTE.EOTE_FIELD_CODE = EOEF.EOEF_FIELD_CODE <<AND EOTE.EOTE_EOTO_CODE LIKE :eoteEotoCode>> WHERE EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_CODE = 'EO_ORDER_EXTENSION' <<AND EOEF.EOEF_MODULE_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eoefModuleTypeCode>> <<AND EOEF.ORG_ID =:orgId>>
